category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 26 (Preparation and posting of safety and health signs)
contents: Article 26 (Preparation and posting of safety and health signs) ① The chairman of the board shall write down the matters in each subparagraph and install and attach a safety and health sign so that workers can check them. Revised 2021. 12. 22., 2022. 12. 16., 1. Prohibition and warning of harmful or dangerous facilities and places, 2. Instructions and guidance on emergency measures, 3. To promote safety awareness among workers. Matters stipulated by relevant laws and regulations: ② The chairman of the board of directors must produce a safety and health sign in a size that can be easily recognized by workers. Revised 2022. 12. 16.
